Generate point positions within a sector

Source: R/neighborhoodSectorGlyph.R
generateSectorPointPosition.Rd

Compute polar coordinates for points evenly distributed within a sector defined by start and end angles.

Usage

generateSectorPointPosition(start_angle, end_angle, n_points, radius)

Arguments

start_angle

Numeric scalar giving the starting angle (in radians) of the sector.

end_angle

Numeric scalar giving the ending angle (in radians) of the sector.

n_points

Integer specifying the number of points to generate.

radius

Numeric scalar specifying the radial distance of points from the center.

Value

A data.frame containing the angular and radial coordinates of generated points. @export

On this page
